# L9S setting file
multiCameraLogicalXMLFile=ziyi_global.xml

# Camera Log
overrideLogLevels=0x1
logInfoMask=0
logWarningMask=0
logConfigMask=0
logVerboseMask=0
logCoreCfgMask=0
logRequestMapping=FALSE
systemLogEnable=TRUE
enableAsciiLogging=0
enableTxtLogging=0
raiserecoverysigabrt=FALSE
offlineLoggerEnableBackupLog=FALSE
enableCameraCoreDumpBinary=FALSE
enableCameraCoreDumpText=FALSE
numConsecutiveRecovery=10
exportSecureCamera=TRUE

#Video skinbeautifie/Filter/Bokeh
isVideoBeautifierSupported=TRUE
isVideoFilterSupported=TRUE
isVideoBeautyEISSupported=TRUE
isVideoBeautyScreenshotSupported=TRUE
isColorRetentionSupported=FALSE
isVideoColorRetentionBackSupported=FALSE
superVideoFilterVersion=1
isVideoBokehSupported=TRUE
isFrontVideoBokehSupported=TRUE

# TS skinbeautifier
isBeautyVersion=72
enableEGLCache=TRUE
isBeautyMakeupSupported=FALSE
isTrueSightBeautyEnabled=TRUE
isBeautyOptionConfigSupported=1

#Video dynamic fps range
is30fpsDynamicSupported=TRUE
is60fpsDynamicSupported=TRUE
dynamicFpsSupported=0@30|1@30|2@30|4@30|5@30|0@60|2@60|5@60|0@60|1@60|4@60

# MultiCamera
isPhyicalMultiCameraSupported=TRUE

# SAT
enablePostZoomFOV=1
enableMFLOEMCustomization=TRUE
maxDigitalZoom=10.0
videoSATSupportedRange=0x03
enablePerRequestSync=FALSE

# SAT zoom animation params
isSwitchAnimationSupported=TRUE
satZoomButton=0.6:1:2:5:10|0.6:1:2:5:6
satZoomTime=800|700

#Disable SAT in third-party app
is3rdLightWeightSupported=TRUE

# MFHDR enable Snapshot Mode
SupportedAlgoEngineHdr=1

# Bokeh
bokehVendorID=0
bokehRelightVerion=2
multiCameraFrameSyncMask=0
supportedBokehRoleMask=0x1
ismfnrbokehsupported=TRUE
BokehSlaveMfnrEnable=FALSE

# Video EIS
#Res1@FPS1|Res2@FPS2 ...,5--720P,6--1080P,8--4K,3001--8K
vsquality=5@30|6@30|6@60|8@30
iseispreviewSupported=TRUE
isFrontVHdrSupported=TRUE

#PreviewEIS disable
isPreviewZoomEISSupported=0

#Enable motion capture
#   bit[0]: 1 means it supports motion capture in capture mode.
#           0 means not.
#   bit[1]: 1 means it supports dedicated denoise algo under
#             motion capture & capture mode.
#           0 means not.
#   bit[2]: 1 means it supports HDR under
#             motion capture & capture mode.
#           0 means not.
#   bit[3]: 1 means replace SR with MFNR
#           0 means not.
#   bit[8]: 1 means it supports motion capture in portrait mode.
#           0 means not.
#   bit[9]: 1 means it supports dedicated denoise algo under
#             motion capture & portrait mode.
#           0 means not.
#   bit[10]: 1 means it supports HDR under
#             motion capture & portrait mode.
#           0 means not.
#   bit[11:12]: default on behavior bits
#           b'00 means off by default.
#           b'01 means it's enabled by default in non-banding env.
#                User enables it manually in banding env via UI.
#           b'10 means it's enabled by default in all env.
#                User disables it manually in banding env via UI.
#           b'11 reserve
#   bit[13:31]: reserve
enableMotionCapture=0x090D

#Enable Touch to Track feature
XiaomiTrackAFSupportedMask=2

#enable mimovie
isVideoMimovieSupported=TRUE

#supernight
MIVISuperNightSupportMask=0x0303

#Dynamic FPS For VideoHDR
isVideoHDRSupportSetFreq=0x3

# override Flash Current
overrideFlashTorchCurrent=150
overrideFlashVideoLightCurrent=75
overrideFlashSnapshotLightCurrent=440
overrideFlashPreviewLightCurrent=150

#Enalbe Auto HDR for MFHDR
enableAutoHDRCapability=1
setAutoHDRMode=1

#disable eis MiMotion
isMiMotionSupported=FALSE

#Flicker
enableSpectralSensor=1

# Quickview
enableCHIPartialData=1
quickviewsupport=TRUE
quickviewmask=0x2F07
addScanIn3ALockStatus=1

# Bit Mask for HighQualityQuickShot configure
# Bit[0]   1    - Support MFSR/LLS in SAT mode
# Bit[1]   1    - Support HDR in SAT mode
# Bit[2]   0    - Support SR in SAT mode
# Bit[3]   0    - Support SuperNightSE in SAT mode
# Bit[4~7] 0    - reserve
# Bit[8]   1    - Support Bokeh MFNR in Back Camera
# Bit[9]   0    - Support Bokeh HDR in Back Camera
# Bit[10]  1    - Support MFNR in Front Camera
# Bit[11]  1    - Support HDR in Front Camera
# Bit[12]  1    - Support Bokeh in Front Camera
# Bit[13]  1   - Support  Macro Mode
# Bit[14~15] 0  - reserve
# Bit[16~19] 3  - HighQualityQuickShot queue length(max number of HighQualityQuickShot)
# Bit[20]    0  - Support reuse RDI buffer or not
# Bit[21]    0  - Support Limit MFNR input frames or not
# Bit[22]    1  - Support quickshot and HightQualityQuickShot mixed use.
# Bit[23]    0  - reserve
# Bit[24]    1  - Mixed quick shot suport SAT MFNR or not
# Bit[25]    1  - Mixed quick shot suport front MFNR or not
# Bit[26]    1  - Mixed quick shot suport Macro mode or not
# Bit[27]    1  - Mixed quick shot suport Front Portrait mode or not
# Bit[28]    1  - Mixed quick shot suport Back Portrait mode or not
# Bit[29]    0  - Mixed quick shot suport Pixel mode or not
# Bit[30~31] 0  - reserve
HighQualityQuickShotSupportMask=0x1F433D03

# Bit Mask for HighQualityQuickShotDelayTime configure
# Bit[0 ~ 3]   500- DelayTime XX * 100 ms of Bokeh MFNR in Back Camera
# Bit[4 ~ 7]   500- DelayTime XX * 100 ms of Bokeh MFNR in Front Camera
# Bit[8 ~ 11]  0- DelayTime XX * 100 ms of Back Normal Capture
# Bit[12 ~ 15] 400- DelayTime XX * 100 ms of HDR in Front Camera
# Bit[16 ~ 19] 400- DelayTime XX * 100 ms of HDR in Back Camera
# Bit[20 ~ 23] 0- DelayTime XX * 100 ms of SuperNightSe in Back Camera
# Bit[24 ~ 27] 0- DelayTime XX * 100 ms of SR in Back Camera
# Bit[28 ~ 31] 300- DelayTime XX * 100 ms of Front Normal Capture
# Bit[32 ~ 35] 400- DelayTime XX * 100 ms of MacroMode in Back Camera
# Bit[36 ~ 39] 0- DelayTime XX * 100 ms of Bokeh HDR in Back Camera
# Bit[40 ~ 43] 500- DelayTime XX * 100 ms of Beauty in Back Camera
# Bit[44 ~ 63] - reserv
QuickShotDelayTimeMask=0x50430044055

#enable actuator powersaving thread
ActuatorPowersavingThreadTime=2000

#cam sync
multiCameraSWFrameSyncInterval=5
multiCameraHWSyncMask=0
multiCameraFPSMatchMask=0x1
multiCameraFrameSyncMask=0x1
multiCameraExposureTimeMatch=TRUE
enableExposureTimeMatch=TRUE
#multiCameraDetectFrameSync=TRUE
multiCameraSWFrameSyncType=SOFSync

# PDAF does not show the focus area frame, CAF show the focus area frame
disableFocusIndication=1

# enableVideoChatPowerSave
enableVideoChatPowerSave=TRUE

# add for cts temporary
halBufferMgrMode=0

# For CTS Reprocess Size
minReprocessInputWidth=0x1FFF
minReprocessInputHeight=0x1FFF

#for burst shot performance
pluginBurstReqCnt=0x1

#flush time
nodeResponseTime=200
sessionResponseTimePadding=250
sessionMaxFlushWaitTime=1000

#VHDR Support Caps
VideoHdrConfigurations=1@5@30|1@6@30

#VideoBokeh Support Caps
VideoBokehConfigurations=1@5@30|1@6@30|2@5@30|3@5@30|3@6@30|4@5@30

#Enable GPU rotate
enableGPURotation=1

#AIIE Capability
AIEnhancementVersion=2

#Enable shot2Shutter for zsl capture
soundTimeWhenAnchor=1
